name: Monster Hunter: Free Sniper Shooting Hunting Game
name_original: Monster Hunter: Free Sniper Shooting Hunting Game
description:
Monster Hunter : Sniper shooting hunting game is about hunter who has been trap between bunch of monster hunters like crocodile , rhinoceros , lions and wolves . Now, hunter has no choice but to kill them all and survive for his life. All is not lost during all of this as hunter is still having modern sniper shooting weapons to protect himself from the dangerous wild animal hunter .

But this survival needs accuracy and stamina to kill the wild hunter coming waves after waves .

Be prepare and hold your breath to target most deadly wild animals in the jungle with your sniper 3d weapons.
